name: Blight (itch) (GatoParty)
description:
Code, art, animation and sound effects where made by me.

I used for Unity for making the game, coded in C# (Visual Studio),  art in Photoshop and sound effects where made by using mouth and phones mic...

The "music" was taken from freesound.org by Xanco123 

(Creepy Ambiance 01: Empty Sewer)

Controls: Moving =  WASD || LMC = Shoot || Q = Bomb
